# Databases 1 (40 minutes)

## Learning objectives

See the readme.

## Instructions

### Starter (15 minutes)

* Walk the developers through the spelunking DataMapper code example.

### Main (40 minutes)

* See the Exercise part of the README.

### Plenary (10 minutes)

Come together to discuss the diagrams drawn.
